projects.title: LaserTag++
projects.term: Capstone Project for NUS Computer Engineering
projects.description: A multiplayer laser tag game with hand actions powered by Machine Learning
projects.attribution: Handled external communications between FPGA, laptop, server and multiple mobile devices. Multicore programming on FPGA to handle concurrent streams of data.

projects.title: Geofencing
projects.description: A web application to track GPS location of specially-abled students inside the school. Made for Rainbow Centre Singapore.
projects.attribution: The GPS beacons ran on Bluetooth Low Energy 5.0 (BLE) and reported info to a base station which talked to AWS using MQTT. The data was stored in Firebase database and displayed on a web app.

projects.title: Pixelate
projects.description: An easy all-in-one platform for founders without technical skills to create their NFT community, while allowing members to freely customize their personal NFT.
projects.attribution: Its written using Notus React, tailwindCSS and Solidity. The Solidity contract automatically mints the art on the Polygon MATIC blockchain and deploys it to the Openseas account linked to the MetaMask wallet used by the user.

projects.title: ConTech
projects.description: A contact management application for computing professionals to enhance productivity with custom fields and a UNIX-like syntax.
projects.attribution: The program was made as part of our CS2113T Software Engineering module.

projects.title: Lowkey
projects.description: Password manager and 2FA web extension to autofill passwords and OTPs, along with data synchronization across devices via the cloud
projects.attribution: The main app was made using Vue.js and Tailwind CSS. The Chrome extension was made using the Chrome API. The backend was made using Firebase.

experiences.title: [Data Engineer Intern] Keysight Technologies
experiences.description: Transitioned 12 internal Spark Batch Jobs written in Scala from client to cluster mode, significantly improving performance and resource utilization. Configured Apache Airflow using Kubernetes and Docker to effectively manage thousands of daily batch job runs, ensuring reliability and observability.

experiences.title: [Cloud Engineer Intern] Singtel
experiences.description: Coordinated a major technology refresh, migrating core business apps from on premises to Azure cloud. Identified an application for code analysis, resulting in a 90% reduction in refactor time for legacy code bases. Conducted proof-of-concepts (POCs) evaluating diverse cloud migration strategies, including containerization, microservices, and lift-and-shift approaches.

experiences.title: [Undergraduate Researcher] National University of Singapore
experiences.description: Independently conducted research at the Mechatronics and Automation Laboratory, focusing on stabilizing visual odometry for TurtleBot 3 using a monocular RPi v1 camera. Implemented state-of-the-art visual SLAM technique ORB-SLAM3, using Python on ROS Noetic (Robot Operating System) and OpenCV.

experiences.title: [Teaching Assistant] National University of Singapore
experiences.description: Mentored 60+ students in Real-Time Operating Systems and Robotics over multiple semesters, emphasizing C programming for Keil RTX OS. Covered advanced topics, including Semaphores, Events, Threads and SLAM. Guided students in creating a remote-controlled Search and Rescue (SAR) robot, incorporating LIDAR technology.
